mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product(PROD_NO, NAME, CUS_GENDER, COMP_NAME, PRICE, LINK, IMG, ADMIN_NO, PRODTYPE_NO) values (seq_product.nextval, #{name}, #{cusGender}, #{compName}, #{price}, #{link}, #{img}, #{adminNo}, #{prodtypeNo})
mapper.select: select PROD_NO, NAME, CUS_GENDER, COMP_NAME, PRICE, LINK, IMG, REGDATE, ADMIN_NO, PRODTYPE_NO from tbl_product where PROD_NO =#{prodNo}
mapper.update: update tbl_product set NAME = #{name}, CUS_GENDER =#{cusGender}, COMP_NAME =#{compName}, PRICE =#{price}, LINK =#{link}, IMG =#{img}, REGDATE =sysdate, ADMIN_NO =#{adminNo}, PRODTYPE_NO =#{prodtypeNo} where PROD_NO =#{prodNo}

sql.if: select PROD_NO, NAME, CUS_GENDER, COMP_NAME, PRICE, LINK, IMG, REGDATE, ADMIN_NO, PRODTYPE_NO from tbl_product where PROD_NO > 0 order by PROD_NO desc, regdate desc )

if.if: select PROD_NO, NAME, CUS_GENDER, COMP_NAME, PRICE, LINK, IMG, REGDATE, ADMIN_NO, PRODTYPE_NO from tbl_product where PROD_NO > 0 order by PROD_NO desc, regdate desc )
select PROD_NO, NAME, CUS_GENDER, COMP_NAME, PRICE, LINK, IMG, REGDATE, ADMIN_NO, PRODTYPE_NO from tbl_product where PROD_NO > 0 order by PROD_NO desc, regdate desc )

select PROD_NO, NAME, CUS_GENDER, COMP_NAME, PRICE, LINK, IMG, REGDATE, ADMIN_NO, PRODTYPE_NO from tbl_product where PROD_NO > 0 and NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by PROD_NO desc, regdate desc )

select PROD_NO, NAME, CUS_GENDER, COMP_NAME, PRICE, LINK, IMG, REGDATE, ADMIN_NO, PRODTYPE_NO from tbl_product where PROD_NO > 0 and COMP_NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by PROD_NO desc, regdate desc )

select p.PROD_NO, p.NAME, p.CUS_GENDER, p.COMP_NAME, p.PRICE, p.LINK, p.IMG, p.REGDATE, p.ADMIN_NO, p.PRODTYPE_NO, t.NAME || c.category_name as typename from tbl_product p, tbl_prod_type t, tbl_category c where p.prodtype_no = t.prodtype_no and c.category_no=t.category_no and PROD_NO > 0 ) where PROD_NO > 0 and typename like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
tbl_product where PROD_NO > 0 and NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
tbl_product where PROD_NO > 0 and COMP_NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
